attributes.action: uk to stand with north Dakota standing rock . Stop human rights violations.
attributes.background: Human rights and treaties are being violated by US government in standing rock north Dakota. This is over big oil money at the risk of many life's and huge environmental impact. Government has sold out its people over oil profit , use of violence to control peaceful people.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
